reviews.body: Very helpful support and easy set up. Works perfectly for our purposes!

Very easy to use and great helpdesk! I tested the app out with an upsell and cross-sell offer and ran into some customization challenges. The customer support of Navjot was amazing. He fixed my issues on the go. I canâ€™t wait to add some more offers and give my sales a boost!
Helps my sales and so far the staff is easy to work with and very efficient.

This a great app to automatically set up upsells. Vey easy to use. The customer support is fantastic. Fast response, fix the problem on the spot while you chatting with them. And if it can't be resolve right away, they will take care of it within 24H. I had  Zachary and Wally helped me and even fix other issue that I didn't see. Perfect!
Bold customer support is excellent. Thank you to Fred and the team who have helped. I will always try to use Bold apps in the future if I can.

poor support! charge the service and do not comply. they charged me 3 invoices on the card and sent only 500 upsell messages. I recommend giving up the app.
I regretted

This app paid for itself in the first 2 days of installation. Plus Bold is by far the best at customer support. When I changed themes, they changed the code to make it work. And that was on a Saturday! Bold for life! 

www.zzzbears.com

I love the new upsell feature!  I sell products individually and as a set.  I like that when a customer adds an individual product to their cart it shows the price difference between that product and the upgrade to the set.  This makes it an easy add.  The reports are great - I like that I can see exactly how much this app makes me every. single. day. :)
I like the this product upsell apps especially the helpful customer service his name call Brendin.
Love it! Combine with the Bold Product Discount app to create 'Buy One Get One' offers.  Check it out!

These guys are exceptional for service. I have not come across service like it in Shopifys app store, and that bit of help is what i always seem to need to get me over an install glitch, or something that i havent picked up. 
Val at Bold, is a joy to deal with and could not be more helpful. My website is www.wineonline.ie - come checkout how much Val has helped me!
Awesome customer service! Had me up and running in no time!

The application itself is top notch, but the technical/help support is amazing!
Dan and Brendin from technical support helped me through various questions and helped me produce EXACTLY what i was looking for!!!

Highly recommend this application.
Wonderful app easy to understand, customer service fast and reliable
Wonderful! Very easy to understand.
Excellent app with wonderful support that is quick to respond to questions.
Great app. Serves a good purpose and defiantly helps to get an extra last minute sale. Highly recommended!
Excellent app. Easy to use, with good support.

Great app, definitely would recommend it to any store with related products that are useful cross-sells or upsells! Zachary was very helpful with a couple questions I had, great quick customer service online chat!
Fantastic product!  Makes it so easy to present other products in a collection to customers!
Great app and very helpful staff.
Danni is AMAZING! She's a superstar developer at Bold and she's gone above and beyond to help me when even Shopify didn't get back to me all day long. I'd give her a raise! Thank you so much!

Great Great Service!! Had an issue affecting two of Bolds Apps that was hard to nail down for me. Called support and the response, communication and customer service by both Danni and Navjot was fantastic! Thanks!

One of the greatest customer service I received and the app is really awesome. 
Easy to use and lots of possibilities for store that have a high number of products and vendors.

This is a good service to use to improve Average order value.  We definitely made our money back within a week.

My only feedback would be more CSS customization of the popup.  It looks a little out of place.  Perhaps some color would improve conversion rate.

I had a great experience with Dan from their customer support! He was able to help me change the color of the add to cart buttons in a flash!

I also love the app!

Dan on the support team was super helpful! I had two or three issues that he fixed quickly, and he sent me personalized videos to help with my specific problem. The app has some glitches depending on what theme you use in shopify. For some reason mine added some text at the bottom when the customer clicked on the upsell item. The support team also helped me fix those glitches. Also, it's a little confusing that crossells are also called upsells in the app. Anyway, just some feedback. Thanks, guys!
I love Dan and Navjot services, they are really helpful, patient and kind. Great App, Great services. Good Luck Bold :)

Absolutely the best upsell app ever. All of my items are customised and this app allows my customers to customise their upsell item before they add it to cart. It is so easy to use and support (shout out to Dan Pfiefer who couldn't do enough to help me) are amazing and really quick to respond. I've had it running for one day and have already had an increase in sales!
App is great but customer service is AMAZING! Whenever I have an issue, someone is right there to help.
Great app and even better customer service. Does everything it claims to do, plus more.

Great app once you get it working with your store and your theme of choice. Customer support seems very good and responsive so far. My recommendation is to get in touch with them immediately after installation to save yourself the frustration of trying to get the app to work "out of the box." Once it works, it works as advertised, helping bring complementary/accessory products within view of your customers as they shop with you.

Support personnel excellent-tried several upsells and they worked at will -showing correct upsells one day and another the other day -maybe i was doing something wrong which i was not able to find out

I've only been using Product Upsell for a little while now and I'm seeing great results already. It will easily pay for itself and increase your Average Order Values. Great plugin and super versatile. Easy to use, setup and install. Every site should have this app.

The app is well coded, and looks quite clean on the front end.

Admit given our traffic though we will burn through 1500 "views" in no time, and for USD$720 a year it's very overpriced given it's simplistic functionality and limited customization ability.  (having to scroll up and down on mobile as well as side to side for different products etc. could do with a little more polish on the mobile side)

Upsell, along with discount and a variety of other great apps from BOLD, are awesome.  They integrate well, they are maintained and their dev team is second to none.   I've been using their stuff for over 4 years and almost 2M in sales!
I think this is a great feature and am glad it was so easy to do. I have wanted to do this upsell and cross sell forever but had no idea how to get it going.

Product Upsell as been a great addition to our store, www.manemanagement.com.  Our customers love the app even though they have no idea of the inner workings.  It just works seamlessly with our store!
Does exactly what it says. Totally worth it! :-)

Amazing app!

Worth it the purchase! I'll be adding many more apps from you guys!

The folks at Bold Apps are very responsive, kind and generous. I had a conflict with Product Upsell & another app and they handled it quickly! I'm glad to pay for apps that work and it's always a bonus when the support is stellar. Thanks!

Needs WAY more options and customize, such as being able to choose an entire collection as an upsell and rotate items, instead of having to choose every single product manually, and only getting 3 options. Why am I limited to 27 characters for title? Really dumb!! And I want to enter HTML so I can insert a simple LINEBREAK But I cannot. Looks elementary. 

Also, Pricing is expensive, why do I need to pay monthly for a 1-off script? $720 per year. Plus if I want to really use this, gotta buy the $15/month 'discount app' on top of this.
excellent customer service..Follow up email asking my for my phone number to speak about the issue was what I needed to hear. Shows concern for the client...Thank you

This is an easy app to install and it is the best upsell app out there.  The display on your site is clean and modern and we immediately saw an increase in average order size.  Finally, no one beats their customer service, they are super helpful and FAST to respond.  We use multiple products created by Bold including Brain and Product discount both of which work with Product Usell.   www.ScalisiSkincare.com

I love this app, it seems the best Upsell app out there.

The customer support is really supportive, shout to Mr.Zachary you're awesome! :D

Works well! Still early days but very promising :-)
The Support team is awesome, Navjot and Danni have been very helpful to customize the app for our store, thanks a lot guys!

I'm new to all this website development and all these apps that help our website run. I am so thankful for your awesome customer service that have helped me with everything I am dealing with. Navjot was awesome to help and solve my problems from behind the scene when I was for sure I broke our website!!!

I am already a user of 2 products from Bold and now setting up the 3rd app. The support from the team is superb, fast in response and getting the issue solved almost instantly! I highly recommended them!
Set everything up and it was working fine, then after a few abandoned checkouts I find the upsell box isn't displaying the upsells I set up, just random items from the store.

Must-have app for any e-commerce store - we find it lifts margins by around 80%.  Superb support also from Navjot and Danni who couldn't do more to help, including customising the popups however we want them free of charge.  Good help is hard to find - this is good help!.

To start out with we are using a suite of Bold apps. Customer Pricing, Product Options, Product Upsell, Loyalty Points, Product Discount and Bold Brain. All of the apps working together have allowed us to expand and manage multiple aspects of our business. Customer Pricing allows us to target specific customer groups for professional discount programs by industry. We use targeted marketing to promote registering for the special discount programs. The customers in these groups are tagged and see adjusted pricing as soon as they login to the store. The ease at which the discounting is handled has encouraged the users in these groups to purchasing more frequently. 

The majority of our catalog is customized or personalized and requires a degree of complexity in presenting the various offerings. Product Options allows us to manage those complex products. Product Upsell allows us to present complementary products when specific products are purchased, Product Discount allows us to create BOGOs, Sales and special promotions all designed to increase revenue. Loyalty Points allows us to build interest and repeat business. All of these apps working together have helped to increase activity in the store. The fact that they are all Bold apps makes them easy to manage and gives us access to the excellent Bold support team
Simple and efficient to setup. It works!

Just started using the app but Bold's customer service is fantastic!  Thanks guys!

-Justin
Works very well for us. Plus the Bold customer service team has been fantastic whenever I've had a problem. I recommend!

The Product Upsell app has saved me a tremendous  amount of time in creating upsell offers that I couldn't do with other similar apps on the Shopify AppStore.  I literally trialed every one of them and I removed them all after a few hours.

So many of them are difficult to use and do not offer what I want in customising the buyer journey.  I found Product Upsell the perfect fit for my business (www.kicoko.com) as it offers powerful features, whilst maintaining the flexibility and ease of use I look for in an app that I enjoy using on a daily basis.

I am looking forward to increase my revenue exponentially since installing this incredible app only one week ago.

Because the app is so easy to install and configure, I have not had the need to contact support yet.  The video tutorials also helped a great deal in my initial setup.
Thought I give a shout out to all who are having doubts on this app. I quite like this app. Support is good and fast. Thanks guys, keep up the good work.

Very frustrated with this app and the changes they made. We sell over the holiday season and loved the fact that we could make any variation of our BOBOs for any number of products. We would have 2 different types of BOGOs going on which popped up at add to cart and also at checkout. Now they don't allow 2 and this is their dumb reason:

"This was changed and the reason for it was based on customer experience; Some themes don't offer a quantity field on the product page and therefore the customer would need to either keep navigating back to the product page and selecting "add to cart" until 5 products were in the cart."

Really? All because of a few horribly designed themes that didn't have 'Quantity field"
Excellent service and it converts!
We have had it for a couple weeks and have already seen the size of our orders double. Well worth it and easy to use.

Well, it works as expected, but after installing and configuring, I've been surprised to find that the application is quite anesthetized, as it does not give a discount after pairing the products. Then I saw that this feature can be turned on when I buy another application for $100 a month. Such a bullshit!
Anyway, I found a free app that adds great work after the discount products are added to the cart: Upsell Bundles (Free) This app works well together this Product Upsell.
My hope is that we are living in a consumer based society, but that's a tremendous drain and misleading! I do not like these types of sellers. What is a bundle upsell with no discount offered? This application has no value in itself, it is simply paired two products, no more.

I was skeptical when I first installed this Upsell app because I didn't know if it would increase my sales enough to cover the monthly fee.  But after 2 months, it is covering the fee plus adding profit.  It is just like McDonalds asking if you want "Fries with that Burger" - shipping costs are the same, but the order just got larger.  I have also installed Bold Brain that works in conjunction with Upsell and it has given me some new "upsell matches" based on shopper behavior that I would not have guessed myself.  I would definately recommend you try this for your store.

I installed the product upsell app a few days ago and am already noticing a massive increase in our AOV.

Since we are a new company with limited funding and minimal brand awareness right now, we are having to spend an arm and a leg to barely break even on the various popular ad platforms. Additionally, being a frugal college student trying to make money online to help pay for my tuition and student loans thanks to my website has been quite a challenge. However, I am confident with Bold Apps, grit, and a passion for e-commerce, I am confident my website will ultimately be a success.

Additionally, I have spoken to the support team on many occasions, and everyone has always been very kind, polite, supportive, and enthusiastic. 

Keep up the good work, guys! :)

This is one of my favorite apps because it works so well, it's easy to customize and the support is wonderful (if needed). I notice it converts well too, love this app and wish I had it installed 4 months ago!  Better late than never.  Thank you
App does exactly what it says on the tin but in a nice user friendly way (unlike a bunch of similar apps I tested). Great support, responsive and helpful.

Very easy app to set up!

Support staff is ery very helpful! The team installs it.
They even offered to customise it when I asked to match the colour of my site.
They were very quick to reply and get the changes done.

I installed the product upsell app just last week and am already noticing a massive increase in our order values.

This is such a big deal to us as being a new company, with limited funding and minimal brand awareness right now, we are having to pay a lot per purchase on Facebook adverts. With minimal profit margins and the extortionate Facebook cost per purchase spend, we were barely breaking even.

I am so pleased with it and have full faith in the company again. So thank you guys for this.

I have spoken to the support team on many occasions. These guys are so polite, friendly and supportive.

You installed the app on my ajax cart without any issues, and it a very timely manor!
So far, it's great! After just a day and a half, I already got my first upsell! Super easy to use too! Great job!

This was a great app until the recent revision. You can display ONLY 3 upsell products. Even if you upsell a collection of 5 or combine two upsells of 3 it will still only show the customer 3 products that are chosen at random. If you need the customer to see more than 3 products, stay away from this app.
Update..... Changed 1 star to 3 stars. We've had to add Product Options app to go along with Product Upsell to accomplish what we were doing with only Upsell before. Additional monthly fee. Still think Bold should have been more open with us before 'fixing' our Upsell. However, they did a free install and 4 months no fee.

We had to disable this because it worked so well, we quickly sold out of our upsell product. 

https://BeSven.com
Amazing service! When I contacted with the team immediately offered me help! We were talking about 20 minutes and is totally kind and helpful! Thank you very much !

Cool upsell app, can't wait to get it going! Big thanks to Rob for getting it going on our shopify store! 

YourLifestyleEmporium.com

This is a very good app. It took a little while to realise its full potential but wow... we were blown away once we got the hang of it. We were so impressed that we now have 3 Bold Apps connected to our store and we are looking to add a fourth shortly once they have integrated PayPal into their new Cashier app. 

Great company with awesome customer service, highly recommended. 

Aaron
Vapebotz
Great Product and Company, we love using their apps, and the customer service is top notch!
Navjot provided me with a fantastic support! I am excited to start using this app!

Great, with this app, why revenue is more and more, my revenue from upsell is very great $300 more in my first 5days, customers will buy another product from my store that maybe they didn't know before, i use it as a poduct testing, before i marketing it, i test the product by put it in the upsell, if many customers buy it means if i market it, it will be success.

Thanks product upsell

I will give 5 Star to the Product Upsell App from Bold Commerce.

I have been looking for up-sell/cross-sell app for quite some time and I also tried out some of the other top apps on Shopify and all those apps had some or the other drawbacks, and I ended up removing those.

Then I stumbled upon this app, great support from Alan and team, and hoorah...I got two conversions (worth $44) within in an hour of enabling just two offers..Cool!

But this app stands out and is the "Winner"...

- Integrates well with your theme, does not seem like an attachment
- Integrates seamlessly with the checkout or add-to-cart flow
- Very easy to setup upsells, you can add upsell to "Check Out" and "Add to cart" for same product, so you can use the offer attached to Add to cart as an upsell, and use the offer attached to Checkout as a cross-sell if needed
- Amazing slick dashboard and detailed reports
- Easy in-app view on offers setup
- High conversions

I was struggling to increase our Order value, to improve the profitability, and the final answer came in the form of Upsell app from Bold.

Every Shopify store should use this app, you will surely see great ROI. Even the fee structure is very reasonable you will get back your monthly investment just in a day or
two...rest is your additional profit.

In summary I would recommend this app to any serious Shopify owner looking to increase their revenue.

The customer support was one of the best from Bold Commerce team.

I have multiple Shopify stores, and have worked with many app teams, but I would say Alan and team are the best.

- They went above and beyond in ensuring and testing the app setup
- They were very patient to educate me and have me up and running
- Customized the buttons to align with my theme (cool)
- Very quick and timely responses, Alan even pointed out some other issues in my theme, which could have adverse effect on my business - thanks

Hands down the best team to work with.
You will be really happy to work with this team.

Great app. Now if only I could get my sales team to always offer upsells! 

Easy to install, chat support is amazing. We use several bold apps and the support is so nice.

I'm not gonna lie. I haven't made a single sale yet, and I believe that one day this app will help me make more money. Apps are really easy to use! I want to thank all the developer for making a user friendly app. I just love this app because there's no necessary coding to the website, just pick the product you want to upsell, then just upsell it! simple as that.
Didn't contact the support team yet since the app is really user friendly and I have no trouble using it!

The Upsell app is amazing!  I am also impressed by their hard working team behind the scenes. Navjot was my assistant.  He is phenomenal!  His responses and actions were very efficient and effective.  Greatly appreciated!  Thank you.  


Latanya 
BabiesandToddlers.Today
Fantastic app!! I can tell just looking at the orders who took advantage of the upsell offer. Very easy to use and increases order totals. Love this app. https://www.foxxholsters.com/
Fantastic app, as always. A lot of the Bold apps are an integral part of our store
As always I chose bold apps as my preferred choice of functionality. Outstanding features in combination with exellent support. - this is my third app with bold.
This feature makes our shop more unique! Very easy to use! Would recommend to anyone! Excellent Customer Service Too!!

Great product and great support

Daniel
https://curegear.com

Received great support from Dan and Graeme. Quick replies to queries, and concise answers that get straight to the point. The app itself displays well and is very easy to configure from the backend. Would definitely recommend it! Feel free to check it out on our site www.gamory.com.au
Great customer service! The team are very helpful and the app has worked well with upselling too.
It works and gives enough customization.

Bhumi helped us so much with our theme with a lot of customisations. I was having issues and they fixed it right away to adapt with Bold's apps.
Excellent, amazing customer service!
Super helpful, hands on support from Bundi, Graeme and Brendin!  Love this app.  Thank you!

We were looking for a good upsell app for awhile until we found this one. It's really easy to use and has quick-acting customer support. It's insanely easy to setup and it is a nice pop-up right before our customers checkout, with a simple "one click" addition to their cart. We had a problem with our particular theme, but customer support was right on it and in no time the issue was fixed. Bhumi was wonderful!

Thanks again!
The customer service is great. Fast response time and very helpful!
Amazing Service! Completely changed the way my store operated! MUST HAVE!
got 2 upsells in less than 1 week installing the app. More to come !!!!
It's great plugin but pretty complicated to customize the look to match with your theme. However! The support was that great and they did it for me! I rate this 5 stars for the great support.

I'm new to ecommerce and found a genuine mentor online by complete chance. I'm not one to fall for tricks and quick success programs as im very sceptical. Then comes this guy who is a great speaker, well rehearsed and smart. There was something that made me think this guy was for real and i got a sense of a genuine person wanting to help others. Adrian Morrison is his name and since i purchased his course (which was the first online course i have paid for) my gut feeling about him was 100% correct. He doesnt leave his students high and dry and interacts and provides great webinars where we learn new strategies to increase our sales in our shopify stores.

I was in talks with his support team who recommend Bold Upsell App. I must be honest i am new to the app and im still in the free trial of it. I have not gotten any extra sales from it yet i must say BUT since th start of May my sales have dried up, i believe due to Mothers Day in the US and so advertising giants have upped their bidding giving us little guys not much hope.

This app has definitely seen alot more extra orders being added to carts. Although i have yet to make a sales on these i can feel its all a matter of time. Once the Mothers day craze is over and the sales run back in i think the full flow of this app will definitely shine through!

I have never had to contact support due to the fact the setting up of the app was pretty easy. Your constant emails gave me more info to digest so ive never had something i wasnt sure about. This is great news for you guys, keep up the awesome job! :)

Tried it for a while. Really enjoyed the app. But... had to uninstall.

Here is the reason (by the way the app works great): 

It just doesn't work with my theme. My theme comes with, certain options, when people add the items to the cart, they can still stay on the same page. With this app, it didn't work. I know there are ways around this problem, by adding ajax to the add to cart button, and etc... Or there are some apps do the job, but, it is not the same and doesn't look good when there is a banner at the bottom. 

If this app works with, my theme in the future, without changing my cart option , then i will be installing again. It might be a good idea to work on this issue, because, when our customers don't stay on the page after adding the items to the cart, there is no point of upselling our products. They get frustrated, and either abandon the cart, or leave the site. Something to think about.
reviews.shop_name: Duck In A Tub Bath And Body

reviews.body: Dan and Bhumi helped me so much with my theme. I was having issues and they fixed it right away. Excellent customer service! Thank you guys!
The app works great, and the BOLD team is always very responsive and ready to help. Thank you!
Loved the Bold Team! they went above and beyond!
Great app. Amazing customer service.
Great product great customer service and online support. Thank you!
Outstanding Support. Dan was super quick, professional, detailed and got our issue resolved very efficiently and painless. Great experience.

Brendin fixed my issue with AJAX in less than 10 minutes. 5 Stars all the way. I would give 6 stars if possible.

Great job.
So far this app is exactly what I was looking for!  LOVE IT!  Great work guys.. .and great support too.
Great customer service! Does what it describes.
Great service, great response time :) GREAT APP
I'm really pleased with the quick and honest treatment received from Bold, and Brendin in particular.
App is Awesome and the customer service team was even better. Thanks Guys!!!

This is a great app. It performs EXACTLY as promised. Even better, the support from the Bold Team is the best. They had some issues with our installation, but they stayed with it. Communication was good. Work was prompt. All in all it has been really good working with this company.

amazing app made life easier making promotions, there is no other app better then this, one feature i like is to create hidden product copies for buy oone get one free.
easy to setup and plenty of options.but cant sort the order of search results by price, new to old, etc

Product Upsell has gained us a lot of extra business with our recommended products after the customer adds a product to their cart. When we had questions and some tweaking, Dan and the Bold Support team went above and beyond to help us out. We highly recommend this product.

I only give it a four because I have not had a chance to start setting up products yet.  However, if this app works as well as the customer service I have received from Brendin, then the 5 Stars will not be enough to show how happy I am. I am very grateful for the prompt responses and resolves I have experienced with Brendin. Thank you Bold team and Brendin. I look forward to using this app and hope that it helps me reach the goal I am aiming for.

App works as advertised and then some. Easy to use, and super flexible. Does a lot more than the other upsell apps I've tried.

But more importantly, the customer service is absolutely phenomenal!

I've thrown all kinds of questions and issues at them, and they've been immediately responsive. They know exactly what they're doing, and every issue (arising from my odd theme) were fixed ultra quickly.

I'm seriously impressed.
Great App. Customer service was super as well!

The initial code installation is very hard if you don't know any liquid coding so prepare to pay for the installation as well. (Which I don't think should be paid). If I'm paying per month to use the app, the company should install it for Free.

So far what bugs me the most is that the basic level doesn't really provide any reporting so for these reasons I rate this as a two star app.

One star goes to customer services and the other for usability. 

We still use the app but most likely will switch if we see some other app with all features included.
Incredible customer support & an app that does exactly what we need it to do! Definitely over five stars!

These people are amazing. They sorted my stuff out with such thoroughness and always checking in with me, it was the most responsive support i have ever seen. honestly, great stuff guys. thank you very much!

Great customer support and attitude!  Haven't had a chance to test out all the functionality yet but I am very optimistic.  I needed a very specific behavior and didn't want to make a huge investment yet - the price is right and I can configure an upsell specific to the cart, I have a lot of gadgets and small add-on items I wanted to present to customers and some on exit actions.  I'll follow up oce I have more time to experiment.  Thanks for the support!
These guys are great. This app is great!

This is a bad review and it's actually the first time I do a bad review on a product!
I have installed and paid for 2 products from bold (discount products and upsell). I manage to install many apps on my site and do many customs changes to my site but the one from bold was a bit hard and asked bold to install liquid as I couldn't figure it out - paid for it and it was done after 2 days .few days after had to update my theme (parallax) and all went fine except  bold products of that needed a brand new installation of liquid codes and of course even though it was 2 days after I paid for first installation and paid for the products bold asked me to pay for it again. wanted to share this info so regular people that are not expert in custom codes be ready to have a nightmare with this products! as every time you will update your website theme you will have to pay again to bold to install their products that by the way are not cheap.enjoy.

Really amazing customer service and a great app - I've yet to delve into the depths of all it can do, but I'm thrilled so far. Thank you. Top notch customer service - quick, friendly, professional - couldn't ask for more :)
Though the job takes a bit long to start, but it was completed in timely manner after started. And the support is very helpful! Thumbs up! Signed up for Product Discount and Loyalty Points too!
Fantastic app, hats off to their helpful, fast, and effective support team!
Great App.  I love the Bold apps - easy to use and very powerful.
Great Support. Brendin and Graeme helped me right away and responded very quickly. This app is very recommended
Super quick and helpful response time fixing even my minor issues. Brendin was on top of it!

First let me just start by saying not only is the entire BOLD Support team for ALL of their apps great (and we have 5 of their apps!) We just took our site live 12/20/2016.  The team we have worked with so far on the Upsell App (MC, Arcee, Aubrey and Tiff) are all amazing! They are able to solve all sorts of little things I tend to create and have yet not been stumped.

Now for the App - it totally works exactly as I would expect.  We use it primarily now for offering free samples with our orders, or to offer options to include brochures with certain products.  We originally got the Upsell App to do BOGO's which it worked perfectly on, but we have restructured our pricing into tiered discounts with the Quantity Break and Custom Pricing App combo instead. 

The BOLD Team did all the install for us and have done some free tweaking just for our needs too.  Always amazing and totally pleased!  organicexcellence.com 

UPDATE: 2/27/17 Using the app now to 3 months and it still works great!  We use it not only for specials but on a daily basis to offer a choice of free samples with each order.  Customers love it and so do we.  And Ron, Dan, Tiff, Arcee take care of us if we ever have a question with this App.  MC, Michael, Aubrey and Zackary help us with our other apps too - the entire team at Bold is GREAT!!!

Product upsell is an app that really "Clicks" with our custmers and helped us to acheive 40% increase in sales on our site - drinkclick.com.  The app is very robust, easy to set-up and displays nicely.

We needed a little help with a theme update and we reached out to BoldApps Support. Brendin's support was awesome and he was able to resolve the problem quickly.

I used Bold Product Upsell for about a year. Every day that it was installed, I was hoping they would either fix the defects, or something better would come along.

This upsell app has countless "leaks" - that is, if customer adds an item to cart, there should be two choices once the upsell is offered: a) YES - add-to-cart; b) No Thanks.

None of this "continue". And the redirect at ATC should be to the place determined by the theme. Upsell just sits there.
When asked, Bold replied, "our customers want it this way..."
No excuse for mediocre UX.

Others have mentioned how this app does not play nicely with the Facebook pixel, especially if you use a professional solution such as Pixel Perfect. Watching the developer of Pixel Perfect and Bold support battle each other gave me a very bad taste about Bold's company culture. Pixel Perfect kept bending over backward, but Bold was not interested. Eventually, Pixel perfect simply coded around Bold without assistance.

Then there was the absurdity of how this app bills for "views" and it SHUTS ITSELF OFF if your traffic exceeds your visitor estimate. Seriously. Every other app in the universe that bills based on usage will measure the usage, then you pay. No -- Bold Upsell is the only kid in the parade in-step. The fact that the app just shuts itself off is reckless. The fact that Bold management thinks this is OK says the company culture is messed up.

I tried every other upsell app on the market -- I want an upsell at add-to-cart, and I want the yes, upsell to add to cart and redirect to where the store goes ay ATC (/cart) -- and the No Thanks to simply bring us to wherever the redirect would have ben for initial ATC. Which for my store is the cart. I tried them all, and none are ready fro production.

After a year with bold on 4 apps (fortunately all removed except for product discount), I will be certain to avoid. This developer preys on inexperienced stores. Don't be fooled.

PS -- I found the better mousetrap.

I've now uninstalled the app and am looking for something that doesn't conflict with other crucial apps such as GA.

Checkout upsells work as expected though. But please note that if you go over the max view limit for your plan, the offers will stop showing automatically and you won't be notified about it. Why not send an automatic email to shop owner? Why not give the option to bump up to the next plan to keep the offers showing?

Very disappointed overall.

Wanted to leave a 1 star review, but changed my mind. Here is why:

Installed the app about 2 weeks ago, paid $25 for their installation because I didn't want to waste my time figuring out their installation tricks - not very straightforward.

After the app was installed I started testing it and discovered that the design of the popup didn't match the style of my store and it was not easy at all to change the button colors etc., fonts, text colors etc. I also discovered that a "No, thank you" button was missing. 

Googling and searching through their FAQ didn't get me too far, so I created a support ticket. The support team is pretty responsive, but was not helpful at all from the beginning - they kept giving me some guidance that was vague instead of fixing the problem. The result - several hours of my life wasted. At that point I wanted to give this app a 1-star review and uninstall it. 

However, the problem was finally solved. After I got completely frustrated, I reminded the support guru that I paid for installation and asked him to just fix the problem. And he did. 

It's a good app, they just need to make the design part easier and stop assuming that everybody knows how to code.

reviews.body: Works well & easy to set up - 5 stars on that front.  Yes indeed, it does pay for itself.  However, a selection of fonts in the upsell pop-up would provide a better continuity of brand image & prevent a less "salesy" approach than the generic format.  It is the sole reason I have chosen other competing apps in the past vs a BoldApps product & will likely not continue with this app.  Function & style is essential.

This is a great App that definitely works with the right product to upsell. We have added to our sales with this, without a doubt.

There are a few issues that could be improved to make it perfect. If doing a duplicate and hide feature, to upsell a discounted offer - the stock is not tracked correctly in inventory - since it is sold as the duplicated item. So unless you have plenty of something and make separate stock piles for each (full priced regular item, and then discounted upsell item) you run the risk of lots of manual product inventory updates.

The other lagging item, is that I can't make an upsell show photos of colour variants specifically - so users would have to leave the checkout process to look at the item and choose a colour - which takes them away from the checkout. I would LOVE it if Bold Apps could do something here - as one of my most popular add-on type items is a handbag with 10 different colours. I would love the upsell pop-up to show all of the colour variant images with an "add to cart" beside them.

All in all - I am very impressed by the effectiveness of this simple app, and it does add to your sales volumes at the end of the day :)

reviews.body: This app is so useful and made e-commerce so easy

Great App and the staff are always happy to help with any issues that I encounter.

Worked with the app all weekend testing out the possible uses. It is easy to use and flexible.  It is easy to install with no help needed by Shappify.  It does exactly what we need.  Not sure about conversions yet as we will go live with it on Monday.  So far we are very impressed!

I'm really impressed with this app.  I'm recommending it to my other Shopify clients too.  Their customer service is impressive.  They offer you solutions and options- and don't seem to miss a beat.  AAA+++
Jim was great to work with and supported the install quickly.  We are going to use more of the functions but so far what we have used was spot on.
Excellent customer service! Great App! Can't ask for anything more.

Amazing! Amazing! Amazing! This is what I've always wanted to be able to do on my pre-Shopify ecommerce site, but never could. It's so easy to use, with extremely clear instructions, and phenomenal fast-response support. Ya gotta try it! It's only been 2 days, I'm still in the free trial period, and I've already exceeded my sales expectation! I love the design of the pop-up messages to my customers, it's so professional, today, and inviting.
Simply put: we LOVE this app! The Shappify team helped install it immediately so we didn't have to mess with the code install. Had no idea how cool this app would be!
Fantastic app, & absolutely awesome support. Product Upsell is one slick app. If only other shopify apps were this well thought out. Did I say the support is just awesome?

I really haven't used Upsell very much, but only because I have a extensive list of many products to sale in my store. And having to set up those upsell products for sale during checkout is quite time consuming.... I did try this App though and I believe it actually works the best in conjunction with the Product Discount App, since I used it for a Cyber Monday Sale. 

One thing I want to mention is that Shappify has an incredible support team! When I was trying to run a sale during Cyber Monday, and the app had an issue. They were emailing me back and forth updating me on the situation over the Thanksgiving break (US) and fixed it before Monday! I am extremely satisfied with their customer support and they are really friendly and very willing to take up suggestions to improve their App! 

I look forward to seeing more apps from Shappify!

We're new to Shopify and were already impressed. However, after seeing Shappify's Upsell app, we are anxious to put it to use! If Upsell doesn't pay for itself in the first day, there's only the shop owner to blame. How we've lived without this, I don't know.
This app is a MUST HAVE! Together with Product Discount it helps you to create a lot of fun and creative offers for your customers. Highly Recommended!

I love this app, i have a Buy One Get One Free running for the first day and have already seen traffic. The support is phenomenal (even without phone support, which would make a great addition) and had responses very quickly with any questions i needed answered. A MUST HAVE APP FOR ANY RETAIL COMPANY!!
Wrote a review 3 days ago and mistakenly suggested them adding a 'no thanks' option to the upsell window.  Well, looks like that is already there!   Great product and worth every penny.

As if it wasn't enough that this app does exactly what we needed (Upsell specific products based on what was ordered) and do it simply and easily, their support is OUTSTANDING. They went wa-a-ay above and beyond to help us with some specific needs, responding quickly, thoroughly, and getting the job done. It's a beautiful thing!
Though it took me a minute to figure out, this app is AMAZING. I cannot wait to run lots of sales using this and Product Discount. It all just works and the support staff is awesome. xoxo

Great app that makes it easy to quickly recommend products.   Would love to see them add a button that says 'No Thanks - Complete my order' or something of that nature because some people do get confused and think the items are already added to their cart.

Despite a wide assortment of products, we tend to have one category that gets a lot of single unit purchases, so we really needed something to encourage additions to the cart. The Product Upsell app works perfectly, is easy to install, and perhaps most importantly, comes with an outstanding customer service team who dives right in to help with the smallest issue.
made back the price of this in the first day after implementing. Awesome app!
This app is great. We have only had it for a while but it has been great and it really works. Highly recommended.
Very easy to use and, as promised, has generated a bunch of extra sales for us on small accessory items. Highly recommended!
We've only been using this app for a short time, but it's been very worthwhile to us as it's helped us gain a ton of orders in a short period of time. Highly recommend!

Wow! I have always been on the lookout for a app like this. When i shop at a online store I can see that ALL of them use up sell applications. And i was so happy after I installed the product up sell app, It's easy to use and it looks amazing. everyone should most defiantly check out this app!
Best Shopify app I've ever installed.  It literally paid for nearly a year's worth of the monthly cost during the 30 day free trial!

reviews.body: One of the top 5 apps that you MUST have on Shopify.   Perfect way to increase average order size and highlight the products that normally wouldn't be big sellers (like accessories)   It was free to try so it was a no brainer.  The test month showed it was a home run app for us.  Its simple, if average order size increases with the 'upsells' and your conversion rate stays the same (or increases), its a winner.
Great App!  Had tons of Upsells in the first few months of use! Definitely recommend this to anyone who wants to make more money!
product upsell is great! does wonders for our daily deals program!
I have installed this on my second shopify store! Needless to say how important this app is to online retailers! :)

reviews.body:
Works well as a basic upsell, and the more I tweak it the better it gets!
Customers happy with the product suggestions too!
DOUBLE RAINBOW :)

So far so good! I had the 30 day trial and since the holidays season is over, there is a much higher need to increase marketing efforts. As they say, "when sales or prospects start to decrease, increase effort and budget in marketing!"

reviews.body: With Product Discount and Product Upsell, Shappify have provided me with a financial windfall I would never have been able to make happen on my own. These two apps working together have doubled my online income in a month. Truly awesome, fiendishly clever, and great support dept too. Highly recommended.
reviews.shop_name: What I Wish I Knew Bookshop

reviews.body: These guys are great! their support got back to us within an hour and hooked us up with exactly what we were looking for.
You NEED this app. I'm so glad I found this. It makes up selling a piece of cake!

This app is a must and is 1st class and poss the best app in the store and even better when used with the discount app.
The customer service is first class and the app will pay or itself.
5 big stars
Great app - even better service! Highly recommend.

This app is AMAZING. I'm seeing conversion rates in the high teens. My only regret is that I didn't load it sooner!

Thanks Shappify!

We're able to use this app to directly benefit our customers by offering products (they've likely never heard of nor considered) that will greatly improve their experience with condoms.  A+ And a total win-win!
It's doing exactly what we wanted and exactly what they said it would. It looks great, it's easy to set up, and it's great! And this is after only a couple of hours using it as a trial!
The app and support are stellar...whether you know how to edit code (liquid) or not, you can get this app up and running very quickly! The upsell options are limitless--it's addictive!

These guys aren't perfect...but none of us is.  We had a problem with their app that messed with our weekend and theirs, pretty severe...it may still be shown below.  But they went above and beyond to make sure it was cleaned up and we were taken care of.  I expect I'll be able to recommend that app at some point (not enough upsells yet), but I can tell you that they have great customer service.
We have only scratched the surface, but love this app as much as it's sister, the discount app!
So far really liking it in my free trial. Will give it a go for a couple more months :)
This is exactly what I've been looking for! I wanted a way to highlight similar products or items that belong together without having to make sets. This app has made all the possible for me!

WOW! I have to say it again WOW!  The service on this app is outstanding.  I was going along fine learning the app and enjoying it when I received any e-mail asking if I had any questions or concerns.  I offered a suggestion and then had a question of how I could streamline my weekly BOGO offer.  I then had great email support - I mean great!  We chatted back and forth via email and I was sent a suggestion which I believe will make my life easier.  Thanks for the support - it means all the difference when you are an inexperienced do-it-yourselfer like me!
With the excellent guidance of the Shappify team we had our first product upsell running in about 20 minutes. Can't beat that.

Product Upsell is an app that won't disappoint! It integrates perfectly. It's user interface is easy to understand and implement. And if questions do arise, their level of customer support is incredible.

I thought I had my Product Upsell all prepared for Black Friday, then Friday morning things were going all wrong. I emailed Product Upsell, mind you this is the day after Thanksgiving, and they emailed me back with in 5 minutes. They then spent the next 2 hours helping me fix the problem and the help me have one of our biggest Black Fridays ever. Great customer service. Great product. Highly recommended.
Great App! Upselling is a great revenue stream
Very clear to use, a lot of very powerful options also. We're gonna run with it!
awesome service. recovered over $340 while still in my trial period. Had an 8% conversion rate but that can be improved with testing!

Shappify did a great job being the puzzle piece that was missing in my shopify store. We have sold almost 100 upsells so far and have been able to offer our customers the added value they had been asking for.  It makes things easier for the customer and easier for us not having to respond to emails/calls about how a customer can add longer warranties or extra accessories to their purchase. 

This is a very easy to use and customer oriented app, I applaud you!

Best,

I do not even know where to start about the level of cusotmer service I have received so far.  Jason spent time with me on the phone and answered a bagillion emails--he walked me through each step and did not give up on me until it was all set.  Absolutley wonderful experience!!!

There's a reason for all the kudos this app receives: rock-solid professional dev and support combined with absolute functionality that serves to boost sales immediately on activation. Brilliant! Of course it will vary for everyone, but in my tiny store this app brought in $376 of additional sales in the first month. Multiply that by 12 and you get the picture. So if you have even the smallest store, it's worth trying the app. I'm sure you won't be disappointed. 

For my store's needs I had to combine the upsell app with the Shappify discount app and also needed to ask a couple of questions along the way. I sent in my support question and held my breath.... For busy Shopify store owners, part of the measure of a worthy  app is in the responsiveness of it's support staff and the support here was outstanding. I will never go back to pre-Upsell days. Love it.

Ok, second time writing this review because the pop up window crashed >:( 

However, the app is great. I wish it has a few more capabilities as far as calculating prices for variable data messages, but it's not necessary. worth the money for sure.
Take back our previous review, one final try and it's suddenly working and it looks great!
This is an excellent app that works seamlessly with our online shop. We are super happy with it.
I would definitely recommend Product Upsell. I haven't used it for so long time but it seems really nice and the App is actually what I've been waiting for in very long time. Perfect!
So far the app has been very successful for us. We are currently even looking to add in their Discount app to really take the benefits from shappify. Great job guys!

This app has solved a huge problem for my online shop.  In my physical location we always offer a Tea of the Week BOGO.  It is advertised on our website, twitter and facebook.  When I opened my online shop I wanted to include this offer and the Upsell/Discount app combination gives me this ability.  I can also schedule the offers so it changes each week making this a low maintenance offer.
So much easier than I anticipated.  Great App
Great app! Not only has it increased my sales but customers are happy too with the special offers they receive... Win Win
Nice app - easy to install, good to use and the customer support is OUTSTANDING.  Very quick and helpful.

FABULOUS!!! So excited to get it working. I'm hoping we'll be able to keep it after the trial period. Right now we don't have many a lot of traffic. We did when I was paying for Google Ads but I just stopped and am ready SEO for dummies!!

Effortless setup and easy to deploy.  I do wish it were possible to see a more specific breakdown of what products were upsold from offers.  It's nice to see the benefits of the app in aggregate from the daily/monthly/lifetime stats, but there is some guesswork on which products are getting a boost if your offers include multiple products.

WOW! Paired with the Product Discount App also available from Shappify you can create so many discount and promotional offers!  And so many combinations, seriously endless. This is a great App...So glad I activated it!
Wow it's ridiculously easy and is perfectly paired with the Product Discount app, I can't believe i've passed it so many times in the app store and missed out all this time on potential sales.
Love it! Great app guys, has converted many times it's value so far.

reviews.body:
Fantastic application for Shopify. This brilliant cart system has just been made better by this incredible app. Being able to specifically target customers with an up sell relating to what they are planning to purchase from you is worth its weight in gold - anyone in business will tell you that!

This app will pay itself off in a matter of days - and in fact, a whole year if I win this competition! ;)

Cheers
Good idea and also grate apps!! I am trying it. Can't wait to see result!!

Within minutes of installing this app we were seeing our revenue/order jump. Product Upsell installs and works exactly as it should, and set-up is easy. Combine this app with their Discount app, and really put it to work. What you lose in margin, you gain in volume. 

This is a must have app for any Shopify store!
Love it!! Allows me to run giveaways! This is a great app!!  I would recommend this app to anyone.
The most useful app I find until now.
Excellent. We installed it, modified the colour scheme to suit, and got add on sales within a day. Another way to improve any Shopify store.

Awesome app. I love that it will automatically drop out the products that are already in the cart, so I can setup an offer to suggest three related products, and setup a trigger for that offer so that it's displayed when any of those three same products are in the cart. Product Upsell then displays the offer, suggesting the two (or possibly one) other products that aren't yet in the cart.

I would like a bit more flexibility in pricing. $10/mo for just one offer means that offer has to bring in more than $10 of profit (not just revenue) to pay for itself.
Totally great and amazing app.  Very easy to install and start upselling immediately.  Level of options and configuration is perfect - feels like an enterprise product for us small businesses.

Hello Everyone... I simply wanted to share with you my experience so far with Shappify and the Product Upsell Application. First of all, the application works exactly as they say it does, so they make a promise and deliver -Just as a company should. Plus, the flexibility offered by the Upsell Application is really well thought out. I have worked in business for 26 years and many of those years were spent working closely with sales staff and software for sales departments, and this application offers not only ease of use, but a means to tailor your upsell offers so they're tied to specific products and more. I'm very happy with this application... BUT THAT'S NOT ALL... The customer service and technical assistance is top notch... In my experience the staff has been very proactive with reaching out to me to see if i need anything, they are very responsive and helpful when i do have needs, and most of all they have made my experience feel as though i am a guest and not just a user. I'm really impressed, and I'm recommending this application for anyone that wants a quality product plus the great customer service that should accompany it.
Sincerely,
Chris

This app along with Product Discount are truly brilliant! They both work so well together and allow me to create and alter specials in minutes!

Any problems I had were quickly ironed out by the helpful and knowledgeable staff. Thank guys!
Works like magic! Conversions do increase
The Shappify team is excellent to deal with!  They respond to questions VERY quickly and always come up with a solution for our needs!
Perfect for my business. Simple and intuitive. Most importantly it increases my sales and margin :)

Wow! they Shappify team went over the top! They modified the billing plans to a more fair program. We're so happy to be able to offer many trigger and upsells and when the time comes that we need more monthly views, we'll gladly upgrade.
Jay was serious in getting happy customers. I was astonished by his sincerity to respond to my emails. Superb customer service. Fantastic app. Look at Product Discount - from Shappify too!
The Product Upsell App is easy to install and use!  I have already used the Product Discount App and got great results with it.  Looking forward to using Upsell with Product Discount.

It's a little tricky to use and I'm still working my way around using it in conjunction with the Product Discount app, but I think it's a brilliant idea. Will let you know if it has helped me boost sales!
Great product, goes great with product discount app. Both of there products are AAAA+++ can't go wrong with them. If you have a retail business, these apps are a must have.
Great App!  Easy to use.  Excellent support.

If only every app for Shopify was so well designed! Upsell is a dream come true for our store. Shappify has taken all the critical features and packaged them in a user friendly package. I am html-clueless and installation was still a breeze. Thank you, thank you! I can't wait to see what Shappify comes up with next!

I think having this app was one of the best moves I made for my business. The support is great!!

Thanks Jay

Great app. at first I was undecided as it was just another additional monthly charge., but then in the first few days of having this installed we sold our first up-sell,. which essentially paid for this app for 2 years.

Killer App, Using this with their new Discount App is killer, Easy to use and well thought out, My only request would be I would also like the ability to have an offer pop up at the time they add something to the basket.   Style looks appealing to the customers and fast,   Shappify also offers outstanding customer service and support.

This is my favorite app yet!  It was so easy to setup and is very affordable. This app has already made me $550 extra in sales this week. I highly recommend this application to anyone looking to make extra money in their business.
Great design, anyone can it's that simple! Thanks Shopify
We just started using Product Upsell.  And only had it setup on a handful of products, but within the first week we already had 3 additional sales for over $100! Whoo Hoo!

Couldn't say enough good things about this app. Seriously, Jason was awesome with the support he gave us and the app combined with the coming product discount app (coming soon hopefully) will make an awesome duo for sales. Can't wait to get my hands on both apps and see what the combination of Product Upsell and Product Discount will do for our store!!

Well what can I say! 

Jay and his team are absolutely fantastic and probably offer the best support on the app store! 

We suggested a few things to them to make the app SUPER good - within 2 weeks they'd completely rewritten it to take into account what we had suggested - simply amazing.

Coupled with their new Product Discount app which is out soon (lucky enough to BETA test this for them!) these two apps really work hand in hand to improve Shopify 10 fold (as lets be honest, Shopify is good but you need a hell of a lot of apps to make it great). 

These guys have the best apps in the store, the best support and really do make Shopify do what it should do out of the box. 

All round very happy and keep up the good work guys!

reviews.body: Great app.  We are averaging a 38% conversion rate for items on Upsell.  It has already paid for itself 10 fold.  Get it NOW!!
Great design, easy to use and quick responses on customer support. We look forward to continued updated such as color customization.

Great app, easy to use and we convert around 34% of all our customers to an upsell at checkout.  Definitely worth the money, and easy as pie to install and operate.  A+ on this app.

Halftee.com
So glad I found this app!  Only just installed it and already added my first upsell offer - and if I can do it, anyone can it's that simple!  Thanks Shopify

Super easy to setup!  One trick we have figured out is that if you want to upsell something with a special discount to increase conversions you can create a new product at a lower price that is hidden on your normal shop.  Might be a good feature to look at adding in the future.
It is easy and straightforward to use. We've already seen a return.
Super simple and helping us get higher average order value.  Pays for itself.  A no brainer.
This a great app! The developers are great too! Quick to respond to emails and receptive to new ideas.

Very good app for increasing conversions.  Also, the new updates allowing to show variants was needed and rolled out quickly.

Nothing but positive feedback for this app.

I love this App! It's a must have! I sold Â£159.99 worth of products in my first month, on the free trial! It's paid for itself for a year already! Excellent design and soooo easy to set up! You must try this out for yourself!
Fantastic app! I've "upsold" $59 worth of stuff in the last 30 days... and my plan only costs $10/month... so you do the math!  =)
Love this app! The developers are quick to answer any inquiries and also to answer any questions and fix any quirks.  The price is reasonable - pays for itself with one customer using it!
I am a very big fan of this app & I recommend it to all serious business owners!

Shopify is awesome, but this app was the deciding factor for us. Looked at Bigcommerce, Volusion, Magento, and 3Dcart and they don't have any features close like this. Great app! and good job Shopify for having such an awesome app store!!
We are loving Shappify's Upsell App. It is exactly the App we have been waiting for. Thanks guys!

Updated from my Previous review:  Support was very quick to respond to the problem of not getting it to work, So I am sure they would have fixed it for me very quickly,   Problems always occur, and can be fixed. So for me good customer support always ranks high, Like I said this app has the potential to be a great app.
